chapters.title: Chapter 1: High Chasaline
chapters.info: Marith Riven, p. 62 (66)—Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah. She was captured and shielded after the battle at Dumai's Wells. Egwene was once punished for throwing a cup at her; Nynaeve relayed that punishment to Seta through the a'dam when they captured her.
